name: Hoppy
description: Hoppy the Frog is an anthropomophoric character based by famous comic book artist and illustrator Matt Fury before Pepe the Frog. Hoppy the Frog is a character from the book «The Night Riders», published in 2012. After the release of this book, Hoppy the frog gained worldwide popularity and became a bestseller in the world of memes. Today, this is one of the few characters of Matt Fury that can truly be considered unique, inspiring the artist to new achievements.
